languages.text: "Я? Мы всего лишь потолковали — давным давно, во время моего визита на твою планетку. Ты думал{mf||а}, обожженный мон-кай ушел от нас живым благодаря своим талантам? Нет. Он ушел, потому что я его отпустил. Со строгим наказом в следующий раз прибыть на рандеву в твоей компании. Что он и сделал, когда я отправил сигнал".

traits.locale_text: "Я? Мы всего лишь потолковали — давным давно, во время моего визита на твою планетку. Ты думал{mf||а}, обожженный мон-кай ушел от нас живым благодаря своим талантам? Нет. Он ушел, потому что я его отпустил. Со строгим наказом в следующий раз прибыть на рандеву в твоей компании. Что он и сделал, когда я отправил сигнал".
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Nothing untoward. We merely had a conversation. It happened long ago when I was visiting your pitiful planet. You thought the burnt mon-keigh escaped with his life because of his talents? No. He escaped because I let him go. But not before ordering him to arrive at my command with you in tow. Which he did as soon as I sent him the signal."
languages.original_text: "Я? Мы всего лишь потолковали — давным давно, во время моего визита на твою планетку. Ты думал{mf||а}, обожженный мон-кай ушел от нас живым благодаря своим талантам? Нет. Он ушел, потому что я его отпустил. Со строгим наказом в следующий раз прибыть на рандеву в твоей компании. Что он и сделал, когда я отправил сигнал".

You thought the burnt mon-keigh escaped with his life because of his talents? No. He escaped because I let him go. But not before ordering him to arrive at my command with you in tow. Which he did, as soon as I sent him the signal."

traits.locale_text: "Nothing untoward. We merely had a conversation. It happened long ago when I was visiting your pitiful planet. You thought the burnt mon-keigh escaped with his life because of his talents? No. He escaped because I let him go. But not before ordering him to arrive at my command with you in tow. Which he did as soon as I sent him the signal."
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: « Je n'ai rien fait de répréhensible. Nous avons simplement eu une conversation. Elle s'est déroulée voilà longtemps maintenant, lorsque je visitais votre pitoyable planète. Vous pensiez que le mon-keigh brûlé s'en était sorti à la simple force de son talent ? Non. Il s'est enfui uniquement parce que je l'ai laissé faire. Mais pas avant de lui avoir ordonné de vous ramener à moi au moment opportun. Ce qu'il s'est empressé de faire à peine le signal reçu. »
languages.original_text: "Nothing untoward. We merely had a conversation. It happened long ago when I was visiting your pitiful planet. You thought the burnt mon-keigh escaped with his life because of his talents? No. He escaped because I let him go. But not before ordering him to arrive at my command with you in tow. Which he did as soon as I sent him the signal."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai rien fait de répréhensible. Nous avons simplement eu une conversation. Elle s'est déroulée voilà longtemps maintenant, lorsque je visitais votre pitoyable planète. Vous pensiez que le mon-keigh brûlé s'en était sorti à la simple force de son talent ? Non. Il s'est enfui uniquement parce que je l'ai laissé faire. Mais pas avant de lui avoir ordonné de vous ramener à moi au moment opportun. Ce qu'il s'est empressé de faire à peine le signal reçu. »
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: “什么坏事都没错，我只是和他好好聊了一阵子。那已经是很久以前的事情了，是我造访你那颗可怜的行星时发生的事情。你以为，这个被烧坏了脸的猴子是因为机智过人才逃过一劫的吗？并不是，他之所以还活着，是因为我饶了他一命。不过，早在我命令他带你一起过来之前，他就已经成为了我的忠实跟班。”
languages.original_text: "Nothing untoward. We merely had a conversation. It happened long ago when I was visiting your pitiful planet. You thought the burnt mon-keigh escaped with his life because of his talents? No. He escaped because I let him go. But not before ordering him to arrive at my command with you in tow. Which he did as soon as I sent him the signal."

traits.locale_text: “我可什么坏事都没错，我只是和他好好聊了一阵子。那已经是很久以前的事情了，是我造访你那颗可怜的行星时发生的事情。你以为，这个被烧坏了脸的猴子是因为机智过人才逃过一劫的吗？并不是，他之所以还活着，是因为我饶了他一命。不过，早在我命令他带你一起过来之前，他就已经成为了我的忠实跟班。”
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: 「別に大したことではない。ただ話をしただけさ。昔、俺がお前の哀れな惑星を訪れていた時のことだ。あの焼かれたモン＝ケイが命からがら逃げ延びたのは、奴の能力のおかげだと思ったのか？違うな。俺が逃がしたからだ。ただしお前を引き連れて俺の指揮下に入るよう命令してからだがな。俺が合図を送ると、奴はすぐに従った」
languages.original_text: "Nothing untoward. We merely had a conversation. It happened long ago when I was visiting your pitiful planet. You thought the burnt mon-keigh escaped with his life because of his talents? No. He escaped because I let him go. But not before ordering him to arrive at my command with you in tow. Which he did as soon as I sent him the signal."

traits.locale_text: 「別に大したことではない。ただ話をしただけさ。昔、俺がお前の哀れな惑星を訪れていた時のことだ。あの焼かれたモン＝ケイが命からがら逃げ延びたのは、奴の能力のおかげだと思ったのか？違うな。俺が逃がしたからだ。ただしお前を引き連れて俺の指揮下に入るよう命令してからだがな。俺が合図を送ると、奴はすぐに従った」
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Nichts Ungehöriges. Wir unterhielten uns bloß ein wenig. Schon vor längerer Zeit, als ich Euren erbärmlichen Planeten besuchte. Dachtet Ihr wirklich, der verbrannte Chem-Pan-Sey wäre aufgrund seiner Talente mit dem Leben davongekommen? Nein. Er entkam, weil ich ihn laufen ließ. Aber nicht bevor ich ihm befohlen hatte, auf mein Kommando hier zu erscheinen und Euch mitzubringen. Und er tat es, als ich ihm das Signal dazu gab."
languages.original_text: "Nothing untoward. We merely had a conversation. It happened long ago when I was visiting your pitiful planet. You thought the burnt mon-keigh escaped with his life because of his talents? No. He escaped because I let him go. But not before ordering him to arrive at my command with you in tow. Which he did as soon as I sent him the signal."

traits.locale_text: "Nichts Ungehöriges. Wir unterhielten uns bloß ein wenig. Schon vor längerer Zeit, als ich Euren erbärmlichen Planeten besuchte. Dachtet Ihr wirklich, der verbrannte Chem-Pan-Sey wäre aufgrund seiner Talente mit dem Leben davongekommen? Nein. Er entkam, weil ich ihn laufen ließ. Aber nicht bevor ich ihm befohlen hatte, auf mein Kommando hier zu erscheinen und Euch mitzubringen. Und er tat es, als ich ihm das Signal dazu gab."
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: «Nada indecoroso. Simplemente mantuvimos una conversación. Sucedió hace mucho tiempo, cuando visité tu patético planeta. ¿Creías que el mon-keigh quemado escapó con vida por méritos propios? No. Huyó porque yo se lo permití. Pero no antes de conminarle a traeros cuando diera la orden. Y así lo hizo en cuanto le envié la señal».
languages.original_text: "Nothing untoward. We merely had a conversation. It happened long ago when I was visiting your pitiful planet. You thought the burnt mon-keigh escaped with his life because of his talents? No. He escaped because I let him go. But not before ordering him to arrive at my command with you in tow. Which he did as soon as I sent him the signal."

traits.locale_text: «Nada indecoroso, te lo aseguro. Simplemente mantuvimos una conversación. Sucedió hace mucho tiempo, cuando visité tu patético planeta. ¿Creías que el mon-keigh quemado escapó con vida por méritos propios? No. Huyó porque yo se lo permití. Pero no antes de conminarle a traeros cuando diera la orden. Y así lo hizo en cuanto le envié la señal».
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Yersiz bir şey yapmadım. Uzun zaman önce o zavallı gezegenini ziyaret ettiğimde sohbet ettik sadece. Şu yanık mon-keigh, kendi hünerleri sayesinde mi sağ salim kaçabildi sandın? Yok canım. Ben gitmesine izin verdiğim için kaçabildi. Kaçmadan önceyse seni de alarak yanıma gelmesini buyurmuştum. Sinyali gönderir göndermez de tıpış tıpış geldi."
languages.original_text: "Nothing untoward. We merely had a conversation. It happened long ago when I was visiting your pitiful planet. You thought the burnt mon-keigh escaped with his life because of his talents? No. He escaped because I let him go. But not before ordering him to arrive at my command with you in tow. Which he did as soon as I sent him the signal."

traits.locale_text: "Yersiz bir şey yapmadım. Uzun zaman önce, o zavallı gezegenini ziyaret ettiğimde sohbet ettik sadece. Şu yanık mon-keigh, kendi hünerleri sayesinde mi sağ salim kaçabildi sandın? Yok canım. Ben gitmesine izin verdiğim için kaçabildi. Kaçmadan önceyse, emredersem seni de alarak yanıma gelmesini buyurmuştum. Sinyali gönderir göndermez de tıpış tıpış geldi."
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai
